subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I know who the would-be murderer is.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Your uncle, sire. He is in league with the local thieves guild and intends to put himself on the throne.

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: The scoundrel! If he thinks he can kill his own kin, he will have to learn a lesson.

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: Thank you for all that you've done. The royal guard will take it from here.
